name: Tweet Lovers
description:
A Unity based audio text adventure controlled by Twitter-tweets.

Mr. and Mrs. Dinosaur got separated when the big comet hit the earth. They are the last surviving dinosaurs, help them to find back to each other and save the dinausaurs.

Note: If you want to play it please poke me at @dasmalle and I will start the server :)

Or start you own with the Tweet listener.
